text: Hi All just a quick Question if you have a dedicated IP with HS and receive this message My name is Lauren on the HubSpot Email Deliverability team. I wanted to check in about your dedicated IP address. We’re no longer able to validate the following DNS records:
How it will affect your emails ?? , i´m talking about a DKIM CNAME record! thanks for the quick answer friends!

I Juan, in this case I think responding to that email is the best way to get more information. If for some reason you cannot reply to that email, the next best option is to contact support <https://help.HubSpot.com/>
